demo.title: Simple Centered Navbar
demo.description: A minimalist centered navigation pattern perfect for portfolios, landing pages, and creative websites. Features responsive design with hamburger menu on mobile.

nav002.title: Logo Left + Links Right Navbar
nav002.description: A standard corporate/SaaS navigation pattern with logo on the left, navigation links in the center, and a prominent CTA button on the right. Perfect for business websites.

nav003.title: Transparent Navbar with Scroll Effect
nav003.description: A fixed navigation that starts transparent over the hero section and transitions to a solid background with backdrop blur as you scroll down.
nav003.heroSubtitle: Scroll down to see the navbar transform from transparent to solid with a smooth backdrop blur effect.
